spell.name: Chromatic Strike
entries: You channel the elements to cover your weapon to smite an enemy.  Roll {@dice 1d8}: that effect takes place.
1-Red. The target takes an additional {@dice 2d6} fire damage.
2-Orange. The target takes an additional {@dice 2d6} acid damage.
3-Yellow. The target takes an additional {@dice 2d6} lightning damage.
4-Green. The target takes an additional {@dice 2d6} poison damage.
5-Blue. The target takes an additional {@dice 2d6} cold damage.
6-Indigo. The target takes an additional {@dice 1d6} thunder damage, and is knocked back 10 ft.
7-Violet. The target takes an additional {@dice 1d6} radiant damage, and makes a CON save.  On a failed save, the target is blinded until they succeed the save at the end of their turn
8-Special. The blade has two elements. Roll twice more, rerolling any 8.
